channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Lai Wants Taiwan To Be 'Asian Hub' for Space and Drone Industries
item.description: Taiwan's new president says he wants the country to become a center of space and drone development. But low investment and a current reliance on Chinese supply chains could make th

item.title: Protests Mount as Taiwan's Legislature Votes on Divisive Reforms
item.description: Taiwan's legislature will continue voting on controversial political reforms until midnight. The bills, pushed by the two major opposition parties, have divided the country and pro

item.title: Analysis: Legislative Reforms Controversial but Not Unusual
item.description: Controversial proposals for legislative reform have sparked fights between lawmakers and protests in the streets of Taipei. TaiwanPlus speaks to political risk analyst Ross Feingol

item.title: President Lai Replaces Law Enforcement Heads on First Day in Office
item.description: President Lai Ching-te has replaced the people in four top law enforcement positions hours after he took office, tackling traffic, police discipline and public safety issues.
